Hi all,

I'm newbie with Scala. I have an application written in Scala and =
integrated with JUnit. I need two methods annotated with @BeforeClass and @=
AfterClass. As I know, I can't use these annotations because their methods =
must be static and Scala doesn't support it. I've tried to extract the meth=
ods to an object, but it doesn't work.

Do you know any way of use those JU=
nit annotations from Scala?

Thank you for your help,

Beatriz Nombela.
